entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:07 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 10:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: SE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle changing to a few flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
